overview: A shipment of Vickers machine guns is stolen from a British warship in Bombasa Harbor, Africa, in 1914, and Denham is assigned to track them down. He poses as a hunter and follows a trail that leads him to Cunningham, a trader, who intends to sell the rifles to the Germans, and whose daughter, Jennifer, Denham loves.
tagline: Soldier of fortune and woman of mystery... trapped in Africa's raging tide of barbarism!
title: The Royal African Rifles
